title: Puppets & Pilgrimage
subTitle: 神工與戲夢：虎尾北港雙城文化巡禮
intro: Connect the 'Cultural Brain' of Huwei with the 'Spiritual Heart' of Beigang. Witness the evolution of puppetry and the grandeur of Mazu pilgrimage.
transportation: High Speed Rail Yunlin Station -> **Taiwan Tourist Shuttle Y02**.

spots.name: Huwei Cultural District (虎尾文化三館)
spots.description: Visit the Puppet Theatre Museum (former Magistrate House), Story House, and the Eslite Bookstore in the old Police Station. A blend of colonial history and art.

spots.name: Beigang Chaotian Temple (北港朝天宮)
spots.description: The Vatican of Taiwanese folk religion. Founded in 1694, it features exquisite 'Cut-and-Paste' porcelain art on its roof.

spots.name: Beigang Old Street (北港老街)
spots.description: Try the famous Duck Rice and traditional bridal cakes. Visit the Zhenxing Theater, a historic cinema turned cultural space.

title: Coffee & Green Tunnel Slow Travel
subTitle: 啡嚐不可：古坑綠色隧道與咖啡莊園
intro: Gukeng is the renaissance base of Taiwanese coffee. Walk through the mango tree tunnel and visit estates that once served the Japanese Emperor.
transportation: Train to Douliu Station -> **Taiwan Tourist Shuttle Y01**.

spots.name: Gukeng Green Tunnel (古坑綠色隧道)
spots.description: A 2km long tunnel formed by 50-year-old mango trees. bustling with a farmer's market on weekends.

spots.name: Huasan Coffee Area (華山咖啡大街)
spots.description: Visit a local estate to experience roasting or brewing Gukeng Arabica coffee, known for its low acidity and nutty aroma.

spots.name: Literature Trail (文學步道)
spots.description: Take a refreshing walk near the Huasan Stream Suspension Bridge, surrounded by poetry and nature.

title: Mountain & Sea Concerto
subTitle: 山海協奏曲：從咖啡香到糖都鐵道
intro: A journey for photographers and couples. Capture the million-dollar night view from Huasan and explore the industrial aesthetics of the Sugar Capital.

spots.name: Huasan Night View (華山夜景)
spots.description: Dine at a landscape restaurant overlooking the glittering plains of Yunlin, Chiayi, and Tainan.

spots.name: Douliu Taiping Old Street (斗六太平老街)
spots.description: Admire the preserved Baroque-style architecture and hunt for local snacks like 'Ba-wan' (Meat Dumpling) in the West Market.

spots.name: Huwei Iron Bridge (虎尾鐵橋)
spots.description: A steel truss bridge built during the Japanese era for transporting sugar cane. A symbol of the industrial age.

title: Pilgrimage & Wetlands
subTitle: 朝聖之路：從國定古蹟到濕地夕陽
intro: Experience spiritual healing at the Wude Temple and witness the resilience of nature at the Chenglong Wetlands.

spots.name: Beigang Wude Temple (北港武德宮)
spots.description: The ancestral temple of the God of Wealth. Witness the world's largest 'Heavenly Treasury' (incense burner), a Guinness Record holder.

spots.name: Yiwu Detention Pond (宜梧滯洪池)
spots.description: Known as 'Little Sun Moon Lake'. A beautiful ecological park formed from land subsidence, now a haven for waterbirds.

spots.name: Chenglong Wetlands (成龍濕地)
spots.description: Enjoy the sunset over the wetlands, adorned with environmental art installations reflecting the coexistence of land and sea.

title: Classic Yunlin Grand Tour
subTitle: 經典雲林全覽：縱貫山海文化長征
intro: The most complete authentic Taiwan experience, covering mountains, plains, and the sea. Ideal for first-time visitors.

spots.name: Caoling Geopark (草嶺地質公園)
spots.description: Explore the majestic Ten Thousand Year Canyon or Penglai Waterfall to see nature's sculpture.

spots.name: Xiluo Bridge (西螺大橋)
spots.description: Once the second-longest bridge in the world. Visit the nearby Wuan Chuang Soy Sauce Factory to see traditional fermentation jars.

spots.name: Santiaolun Beach (三條崙海水浴場)
spots.description: Relax by the windmills and the sea before heading home, completing your journey from the mountains to the ocean.

title: Hidden Gems & Forest Healing
subTitle: 慢遊隱藏版：深度探索與森林療癒
intro: Avoid the crowds and dive deep. From the oyster culture of Taixi to the bamboo forests of Shibi, discover the hidden side of Yunlin.

spots.name: Taixi Fishing Harbor (台西漁港)
spots.description: See the 'Oyster Shell Mountain' and take a raft tour. Experience the rugged and authentic life of the oyster farmers.

spots.name: Tuku Old Street (土庫老街)
spots.description: A quiet town famous for Duck Vermicelli and traditional 'Shuang Gao Run' (rice cake). Enjoy the slow pace of life.

spots.name: Five Yuan Two Jiao (五元兩角)
spots.description: A secluded bamboo forest trail resembling scenes from a martial arts movie. The ultimate summer retreat.
